[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@lp/ui](./ui.md)

## ui package

<img src="" align="right" />

<h3>Design system for Language Power project</h3>

`@shlack/ui` is a package containing common ui component and utilities for LP app. This a relaunch of language learning app <b>Language Power</b> which you can learn more about by visiting <a href="https://github.com/marusyaganza/language-power" target="_blank"> the repo on GitHub </a>

This package is using storybook for live premiew. Learn more on <a href="" target="_blank">Preview link will be added soon</a>

## Remarks

Happy learning
